$interpreted: : Four years ago

Henchman: Boss, we've captured two people. 
They claim to have escaped from the Atlas mines.
Bandit King: What? Isn't that where Kingdom of the Sun sends their criminals to mine for stones? How did they escape?
Henchman: According to them, a lot of monsters just popped out of nowhere. They killed guards and monsters amid the chaos and make their escape.
Bandit King: Ho~ interesting. Bring them up; I'll take a good look at them.
Bandit King: So it's you two who escaped? Where did you come from, and what crimes did you commit to end up in the mines?

Jeff: W, we came from the Elana Village.
I just accidentally caught wind about the tax officer's shady dealings.
Jeff: That was all it took for him to get me arrested with some random excuse and sent to the mines. I'm not a criminal.
Bandit King: What? How boring.
Bandit King: How about you?
Roger: I killed the tax officer...
Bandit King: Haha, you serious? You had the balls to kill a tax officer!?
Roger: That bastard was not worth the air he breathed. He murdered my parents, my younger sister, then made it look like an accident. He deserved to feel my vengeance!
Bandit King: Haha, you're ****** nuts; I like it! The cut on your right arm looks pretty new. Did you sever it while fighting monsters on your way out of the mines?
Bandit King: You seem to have what it takes. Come, join me and become one of my men!
Kittyeyes: B, Boss, would you like to have your meal now...
Bandit King: I'm talking with other people; who asked you to butt into our conversation!
Roger: Lina!?

Bandit King: Lina?
Did you mistake her for someone else? Her name is Kittyeyes.
Jeff: Roger, calm down. Look at her ears; she's a demihuman. Not your dead sister.
Roger: You're right... but how in the world can they look so alike...
Bandit King: This fool is a slave I bought for cheap, but she is dumber than a rock. Can't even learn the most basic manners. Ugh, annoys me to no end!
Kittyeyes: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'll learn better in the future. Please... please stop hitting me...
Roger: ... Stop it...
Bandit King: What did you say?
Roger: ... I'm telling you to STOP IT!

Roger: From now on, I'm the boss of this camp.
If you have any problems, come at me!
Roger: There, there, you don't have to be scared. Everything is ok now. I won't let any harm come to you...
Kittyeyes: Brother Roger, why are you sleeping here?
Roger: ... Got tired on patrol, decided to grab a little shut-eye. No need to worry.

Kittyeyes: Right...
I just overheard you mentioning Lina in your sleep talk. Did you dream about her?
Roger: No. I dreamed about the first time I met you.
Kittyeyes: I see...
Kittyeyes: To be honest, it was thanks to meeting brother Roger that my life was able to make a complete turnaround.
Roger: Same for me. After my revenge was complete, I had no will to live on. The reason I escaped the mines was for only for the sake of Jeff.
Roger: Only until meeting you did I regain my urge to live on.
Kittyeyes: Is it because I look a lot like your little sister?
Roger: What?

Kittyeyes: What I mean is that... after all these years...
do you still view me as a little sister?
Roger: Umm... of, of course, you're my beloved little sister... but I don't treat you as Lina's replacement.
Roger: It's more like you're my other little sister...
Kittyeyes: Haha, brother Roger, why are you flustering so much. I was kidding with you.

Roger: What... so you're only messing with me?
Hahaha...
Kittyeyes: ......

Model.Text: Four years ago

Boss, we've captured two people. 
They claim to have escaped from the Atlas mines.
What? Isn't that where Kingdom of the Sun sends their criminals to mine for stones? How did they escape?
According to them, a lot of monsters just popped out of nowhere. They killed guards and monsters amid the chaos and make their escape.
Ho~ interesting. Bring them up; I'll take a good look at them.
So it's you two who escaped? Where did you come from, and what crimes did you commit to end up in the mines?

W, we came from the Elana Village.
I just accidentally caught wind about the tax officer's shady dealings.
That was all it took for him to get me arrested with some random excuse and sent to the mines. I'm not a criminal.
What? How boring.

I killed the tax officer...
Haha, you serious? You had the balls to kill a tax officer!?

I'm talking with other people; who asked you to butt into our conversation!

Lina?

Roger, calm down. Look at her ears; she's a demihuman. Not your dead sister.
You're right... but how in the world can they look so alike...
This fool is a slave I bought for cheap, but she is dumber than a rock. Can't even learn the most basic manners. Ugh, annoys me to no end!
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'll learn better in the future. Please... please stop hitting me...
... Stop it...
What did you say?
... I'm telling you to STOP IT!

There, there, you don't have to be scared. Everything is ok now. I won't let any harm come to you...

... Got tired on patrol, decided to grab a little shut-eye. No need to worry.

Right...
I just overheard you mentioning Lina in your sleep talk. Did you dream about her?
No. I dreamed about the first time I met you.
I see...
To be honest, it was thanks to meeting brother Roger that my life was able to make a complete turnaround.
Same for me. After my revenge was complete, I had no will to live on. The reason I escaped the mines was for only for the sake of Jeff.
Only until meeting you did I regain my urge to live on.
Is it because I look a lot like your little sister?
What?

What I mean is that... after all these years...
do you still view me as a little sister?
Umm... of, of course, you're my beloved little sister... but I don't treat you as Lina's replacement.
It's more like you're my other little sister...
Haha, brother Roger, why are you flustering so much. I was kidding with you.

What... so you're only messing with me?
Hahaha...
